Reviews.Title: Cameras are OK but have some qirks!
Reviews.Author: Jayman

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo183UX2K7GOAUWcurrentClick) { return cv_mo183UX2K7GOAUWcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:44 MinsUpdate: It is sad to see several painfully obvious fake/paid reviews for this item. Buyer beware! I can tell you that I have attempted to work with Foscam support on several occasions and it was not the wonderful experience all these "reviews" have made it out to be. Both email and phone support was horrible and useless. I still have the same problem and would not dare waste any more time with Foscam support.These cameras are fine for the price point. Nothing to rave about. The browser controls are quirky and take way too much fuss to get email, ftp or recording setup. These areas need to be seriously revamped. I have three of these things bought from Amazon and they all have the same issue. Each night when they switch to night mode they begin to flicker, this is the best way I can describe it. It cannot be seen with your naked eye but when viewed through any software or browser it looks as if it is switching from IR on to off. The only way to resolve it is to login via the browser and change the resolution and then set it back to where you had it. This somehow stops the odd behavior. I have tried to contact Foscam support but waiting for 1.5 hours on hold is beyond ridiculous and I eventually just give up.

Reviews.Title: Cameras have defect from manufacturer...
Reviews.Author: roach
Reviews.Content: Cannot be used in brightly-lit rooms with highly-detailed views. New ones have supposedly been fixed. Will have to re-order multiple times before you can get a working camera. Manufacturer is unwillingly to help.

Reviews.Title: fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Anton Albert
Reviews.Content: the camera works phenomenally.  I was extremely pleased with the support. Irish  the support person was very knowledgeable and helped me with a problem connecting to the internet within minutes.  Top rate!!

Reviews.Title: great camera and super suport
Reviews.Author: alcacc
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best camera packages for DIYer's!!!  I am not computer literate but after I called support for help they did it all for me and now we are good to go!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Works pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris & Lara Macumber
Reviews.Content: Set up is a challenge even if you have a good idea about home networking.  A little tinkering and you will get it running.  Pan or tilt (depending on if you have it inverted) controls are reversed? Bought two and one was DOA (IR night vision didn't work when using POE). Returned defective one and have to order again but other unit worked as advertised.  Never called customer support so I can't tell you if it as good as the Foscam errr I mean other reviewers say it is but if you have a medium-low level of networking understanding you will get them working! Makes for a good baby monitor with two-way sound and night vision.

Reviews.Title: Great Service!!!!
Reviews.Author: James Van Bibber
Reviews.Content: Works great with families with Kids!!! Highly recommend and easily connected to the network. Great Tech Support Team - Fantastic Purchase!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera with POE
Reviews.Author: NotOnline
Reviews.Content: These are OK cameras for the price. I do like the Pan and Tilt feature. They are twice as good as the TENVIS JPT3815W. The resolution is better and the Blur from a moving object is not as bad on this camera. The other advantage is this particular model works well with POE. I used the TP-LINK TL-SF1008P switch and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product For The Price
Reviews.Author: B Dickerson
Reviews.Content: Just installed on my LAN with a Linksys WRT54G router.  Excellent picture both locally and over the internet.  Pan is quite and smooth.  Night vision is excellent.  Assuming it continues to work, and some lesser functions that I haven't tried (like snapshot, record, etc.) work, this is one of the best products for the price I have purchased in a while.Only point that I would bring up is that a static IP address is required for the camera to ensure continued internet access in the event of a power glitch, or if the router get turned off and back on at some point.  The installation documentation is not very clear on this process, so plan on a little bit of research time here.Otherwise, great!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAM! GREAT HELP
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: FOSCAM IS GREAT THEY SET UP MY CAMERA FOR ME IN 20 MIN AND I HAD 2. JEES THE REP WHO HELPED ME WAS GREAT VERY PATIENT AND EVEN HELPED WITH INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO VIEW MOBLIE. GREAT TECH SUPPORT. IF YOUR HAVING A PROBLEM JUST CALL THEM. THEY WILL GET YOU UP AND GOING.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: martin
Reviews.Content: I love the camera. The support team is great, faster response. I would recommend this cam to anyone who is looking for the ip cam. It is easy to use and picture is clear. This camera is for my home security...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Chris Barnett
Reviews.Content: Great customer service..... hooked me right up. Camera is good in daytime and Night...Night vision great.  Remote access was setup and I can view on computer and phone. Tks  Irish  This is for home security and Monitoring. I do recommend this one over others.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera and support
Reviews.Author: kendy real
Reviews.Content: good customer service from Irish. Great features such as : wireless and great picture quality. I use it for home monitoring great quality.....

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Mark Dickerson
Reviews.Content: Great Camera and Support!! Irish was a big help in supporting my needs. The camera features are great! Highly Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Customer service
Reviews.Author: Rachel A. Ebner "irae74"
Reviews.Content: I've had good luck with the cameras and great customer service!  Any issues I have they help me with right away!I love that the camera is wireless.  I bought these to help keep an eye on things while I am away.

Reviews.Title: support for camera setup was awesome
Reviews.Author: sabel
Reviews.Content: I called for help with setup of my new foscam camera and Adam Hill was a huge help.Thank you

Reviews.Title: good helper
Reviews.Author: grace malone
Reviews.Content: good helper  with setting up my camera. will be getting more for the shop and home really like it. thank you

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, Super awesome customer support
Reviews.Author: Fred Bloggs
Reviews.Content: I got the first camera as a gift and set it up for viewing my new puppies and so the new puppy owners could see their new puppies. Worked awesome, much easier install than the instructions would have you beleive.The puppies sadly got to it and we had to order a new camera. I got the new camera hooked up and although anyone in my house could access it, no else could that previously had access to it could. I called Foscam customer service and talked to Irish (I should mention here it was a VERY short hold time). Within 5 minutes "Irish" had the problem corrected by using my own computer to do it! Super easy!

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera, GREAT customer service!!
Reviews.Author: Debra Ann OGrady
Reviews.Content: Irish helped me configure the camera and was great and walked through all the steps!what is the use: Baby monitorfeatures: wireless, zooms in and out/ can talk back, clear picture & great quality!!Bought 3 of these cameras for grandparents house as well!! will recommend product!

Reviews.Title: Foscam cam and support
Reviews.Author: R.W.
Reviews.Content: Irish was very helpful and set up everything for me. Love all features If you have a new baby you need this camera. The tech support will help you with everything you need!

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Fnu Stevenus
Reviews.Content: Camera works very good and support always help me whenever I need help with the camera settings! Work everywhere and anytime. Irish helped me very well and very fast as well without wasting time!

Reviews.Title: yes yes yes
Reviews.Author: Peter Rini "FlaPrince"
Reviews.Content: after some initial small growing pains Mason at customer service was awesome. He got it running in no time bit local and remote. wow does it work great

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JUDY EASTERLING
Reviews.Content: Easy installation and excellent tech support  Love being able to check it from anywhere and also able to communicate with my staff via the camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech. support
Reviews.Author: edward
Reviews.Content: I had my router crash and had to be replaced. i was lucky evough to get tech support late at night. John (tech support) informed me that all six cameras would have to be reconfigured one by one. he was very helpful and patient. It took a couple of hours to finish this. I couldnt have done it without him. By far one of the very best support teams  i've ever used. I would recommend any foscam product because if you have any problem they will fix it. I have never had an unresolved issue with any of my cameras. great job!!

Reviews.Title: Pan & Tilt nice, image quality isn't.
Reviews.Author: Brian Gray
Reviews.Content: Image quality is unusable for identification of tresspassers.  Pan Tilt function is nice.  I used this with Blue-Iris for recording.  That integration was easy.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: PacketRider
Reviews.Content: This is one of the cheapest cameras out there that offers the followings: tilt and pan, night vision, and PoE (with the option to use the included AC adapter instead of PoE). All these functions work as advertised. I can even use a free cam viewer app on my iPhone to view the live stream. You can use either Internet Explorer or Chrome to view the video. I have not tested on Firefox, but there is no reason it should not work on FF.It would have gotten 5 stars if it offers https instead of unsecured http to view the camera from the Internet. HTTP is fine if you point this camera away from any sensitive area in your home or business, but I use this camera to keep an eye on a baby, so I would like to make sure that the stream is encrypted. Fortunately, I have a VPN connection to the camera so the video stream is encrypted through that.Another bad about this camera but not significant is its audio. The audio only works under Internet Explorer with ActiveX. The sound is pretty bad. I am willing to pay an extra $25 for this camera if it includes https and better audio.

Reviews.Title: Foscam overheating problem
Reviews.Author: B. Richardson
Reviews.Content: I now have three Foscam cameras. I bought this one for PoE feature along with the external enclosure. What I have discovered is that this series of cameras is over sensitive to heat. When ambient tempature got over 85, camera would start rebooting repeatedly or lose video. I have the same problem with a camera I have mounted inside, but near the ceiling in an exterior window.So as long as you keep them cool, them seem to work OK. But be aware the operating temperature is not very robust. The specs for these cameras don't list operating temperature, just 'storage temperature', and then range for this should be wider than operating temperature. The storage temperature range is -10°C ~ 60° (14°F ~ 140°F).Completely unusable as an exterior camera, or in any area not environmentally controlled.Update Nov 2013, the problem is not overheating. There is a problem with the DSP that causes the camera to reboot when the image is 'complex' or too bright. Which is why it appeared to be an overheating problem. The company did warranty the camera, they took it back and updated the DSP (factory only) and the issue is resolved. But I did not get any information that the issue is resolved in they current inventory.The image was an average view exterior of my house.

Reviews.Title: bummer and disappointed
Reviews.Author: Hawkster
Reviews.Content: returned the product, it was large, slow, poor quality and the wife told me "no way are you putting that in our house"I purchased a more professional product that she agreed to from Automatemyhome.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Part Shipped Twice
Reviews.Author: Livid Buyer
Reviews.Content: They shipped the 8910W when I ordered the 8910E... I called Amazon and Amazon Customer Service is by far the best to deal with, VERY HELPFUL! She contacted Foscam and this is where it went bad. They wanted me to email them to get an RMA, then ship it back my cost to get a replacement. I asked Amazon if they could just send me another one... But the correct one! Foscam said they would ENSURE proper camera! Got the second one WRONG again! Tired of dealing with them. The "E" style is about $20 more and you get the "W" with a sticker on it that says "New Style 8910E"... I have a few "W" type cameras and they are NO different then the one they shipped me!

ProductInfo.Features:
Building on the success of the Foscam FI8918E, the FI8910E is the latest camera from Foscam Digital Technologies LLC. It features high quality video & audio, pan/tilt, remote internet viewing, motion detection, night-vision, embedded IR-Cut filter, built in network video recording system as well as free telephone technical support available from Foscam Digital Technologies LLC.
The distinguishing features of the FI8910W are the embedded IR-Cut off filter, upgraded external housing, wider horizontal panning range and 2 year Warranty.
The IR-cut filter provides true & accurately images fixing the problems related to washed out and discolored images. In addition, the cut off filter also allows the camera to properly automatically adjust to changing lighting conditions so the user does not manually have to do this.
Also includes, two-way audio monitoring, remote pan/tilt control (pan:300° & tilt:120°), freely control IR-LED on/off for night vision (up to 8 meters)
Remote viewing via local network or internet, record from anywhere anytime, motion detection alert via email or upload image to FTP, Blue Iris compatible; Supports all standard browsers, Iphone, Ipad, Ipod, Android & BlackBerry, POE Compliant (IEEE 802.3af), Input Voltage of DC 36 V - 57 V, Output Power of 15.4 W Max
ProductInfo.Name: Foscam FI8910E Power Over Ethernet (POE) Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with IR-Cut Filter for True Color Images - 8 Meter Night Vision and 3.6mm Lens (67° Viewing Angle) - White NEWEST MODEL
